title: Bloody Streets (PC) 2014
description:
================================
Year: 2014 
Genre: Action, Shooter, Arcade 
Developer: Headless Wizard 
Publisher: Headless Wizard 
Publication Type: License 
Language text: English 
Language voice: English 
Tablet: Not required 

================================
> Operating system: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 
> Processor: Dual-Core 1.6 ghz / AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.0ghz 
> Memory: 1 GB 
> Graphics card: Intel HD 4000 or better 
> Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectXÃ‚Â® 9.0 
> Free space on hard disk: 1 GB 

================================
Bloody Streets is a 2D top-down brutal and challenging shooter game with lots of blood. The game has been developed by our indie game development team, Headless Wizard. 
It is a modern remake of classic top down shooter formulas and our goal was to reinvent the feel of the old arcade games with the desired quality by the players today. 

================================
Fast paced arcade style action 
Use of the environment as weapons in combat 
Unique art style 
Traditional frame by frame animations 
Music dynamic rhythm system

Fountainhead - GAMES MEGA TORRENTS -
Games for English and Russian audience
